description: Central profile inventory - lists all existing profiles by name to prevent duplicates. Use this to check what profiles already exist before creating new ones.

categories.description: Animals profiles can have clues about their characteristics, behavior, and interactions with humans. It could have all kind of animals, from small mammals to large predators. It does not necessarily need to be a real animal, but could be a fictional character in a movie, a mythical creature or a character from a book.

Brands profiles can have clues about their origin, products, history, and other important aspects. It could have all kind of brands, from tech companies to beverage manufacturers to automotive brands. Clues focus on brand characteristics, innovations, and notable facts without directly revealing the brand name.

Geography profiles can include countries, famouse cities, famouse regions (like continents, oceans, etc.). The clues could be about their history, culture, famous events/stories, literature, and other important aspects. Try to avoid too much obvious info in the clues.

Famous people profiles can have clues about their history, achievements, physical aspects and other important aspects. It could have all kind of famous people, from historical figures to modern ones. It does not necessarily need to be a real person, but could be a fictional character in a movie, a historical figure not necessarily live anymore or a character from a book.

Movies profiles can have clues about their plot, characters, actors, director, release date, genre, and other important aspects. It does not necessarily need to be a movie, but could be a character in a movie or a famous director.

profiles.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

categories.description: Sports profiles can have clues about their history, rules, players, teams, and other important aspects. It not necessarily needs to be the name of the sport, but the profile could be about an player, a team, or a sport in general. It could have all kind of sports, from soccer to basketball. It does not necessarily need to be a real sport, but could be a fictional one in a movie.

Technologylogy profiles can have clues about their history, features, and other important aspects. It could have all kind of technologies, from smartphones to computers. It does not necessarily need to be a real technology, but could be a fictional one in a movie or a character from a book.

History profiles contain clues about historical events, figures, and periods. Includes major transformations like the fall of empires, revolutions, wars, and ancient civilizations. Clues focus on lesser-known details and context to avoid obvious information.

Literature profiles contain clues about books, authors, literary characters, and stories. Includes famous novels, celebrated authors, iconic characters like Jack Torrance from The Shining, and literary works from various genres and time periods. Clues avoid obvious information to maintain challenge.

profiles.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

categories.description: Music profiles can have clues about their history, achievements, styles, and other important aspects. It could have all kind of music-related subjects, from musicians to bands to music genres. It does not necessarily need to be a real musician, but could be a fictional character in a movie or a historical figure.
